BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Sitings and Dispositions

Items.Title: Application number  20205414 HAM (2274 Adam Clayton Powell ANCP – UDAAP/Article XI) submitted by the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development pursuant to Article 16 of the General Municipal Law and Section 577 of Article XI of the Private Housing Finance Law for approval of an urban development action area project, waiver of the area designation requirement, waiver of the requirements of Sections 197-c and 197-d of the New York City Charter, and approval of a real property tax exemption for property located at 24 West 132nd Street (Block 1729, Lot 45); 37 West 138th Street (Block 1736, Lot 23); 202 West 133rd Street (Block 1938, Lot 38); 2274 Adam Clayton Powell Jr.  Boulevard (Block 1939, Lot 34), Borough of Manhattan, Council District 9, Community District 10.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
